TopicTitle: Map view filter buttons not responding

Articles.Content:
When I go to map view in midflight, filter buttons in the upper part of the screen are not responding to click and don't even get highlighted when I point mouse cursor over them. Problem solves itself after I spend some time in map view clicking random stuff (seems like there is no specific action that "unlocks" those buttons, except going to debug menu->log, somehow after this it suddenly starts working; log is clean BTW). Problem was also present back in 0.25. Any ideas where to start looking?
